Package voltage.core

Class VoltagePluginHost

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageComponent
voltage.core.VoltagePluginHost
public class VoltagePluginHost
extends VoltageComponent
Control to host plugins. Used in Cherry Audio's PlugIn Host modules.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  VoltagePluginHost.MidiMessageWithSampleOffset
    Constains a MIDI message with a sample time.
    static class  VoltagePluginHost.VoltagePluginTypes
    Types of supported plugins.

    • Load

      public boolean Load​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Load a plugin.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the plugin.
      Returns:
      true if it has loaded.

    • Load

      public boolean Load​(java.lang.String filePath, int pluginIndex)
      Load a plugin with a plugin index (Used in VST3s)
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the plugin.
      pluginIndex - the index of the plugin.
      Returns:
      true if it has loaded.

    • Loaded

      public boolean Loaded()
      Is a plugin loaded?
      Returns:
      true if loaded.

    • ProcessSamples

      public boolean ProcessSamples​(float[][] audioBuffer)
      Process a buffer of samples.
      Parameters:
      audioBuffer - a buffer of stereo audio data. ( Up to 4 channels of input data.)
      Returns:
      returns true if processed. The audioBuffer data contains the processed data on return.

    • SetMidiData

      Sends MIDI data to the plugin.
      Parameters:
      midiDataList - midi events with time offsets.

    • SetParameterValue

      public void SetParameterValue​(int paramIndex, float newValue)
      Set a parameter's value.
      Parameters:
      paramIndex - the index of the parameter to adjust.

      Parameters:
      paramIndices - a list of the parameter to adjust.
      paramValues - the values to adjust from 0.0 to 1.0.

      Gets the plugin's state data. This is useful for restoring a plugin to it's current state.
      Returns:
      the buffer of state data.

      the bounds of the editor.
